titles.title: Presidential Library Donation Reform Act of 2014
A bill to amend title 44, United States Code, to require information on contributors to Presidential library fundraising organizations, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
